title: Records
context: ยง346-166 Records. Every group child care home and group child care center shall keep such records and shall file with the department of human services such reports as required by rules adopted by the department. All records and all information obtained concerning children or their parents or relatives shall be kept confidential by the provider and by members of any department herein named. [L 1985, c 208, pt of ยง2; am L 1987, c 339, ยง4]
